group.__comment_group_1__: For new group, must have correct short_name, along with group_title, ordered and standalone fields
group.__comment_group_2__: If group exists, still need correct: group_title, ordered and standalone fields
group.__comment_group_3__: For existing groups, keep default keys and values (other than group_2 above), EXCEPT short_name
group.__comment_short_name_1__: Always and only include short_name if this is a new group.
group.__comment_short_name_2__: OTHERWISE (group exists) delete the short_name key and value. No editing since only creating!!
group.__comment_standalone_1__: default standalone paragraphs to yes or no.  Can override for individual paras
group.__comment_standalone_2__: by adding standalone as key & yes or no value to the individual paragraph record
group.__comment_ordered_1__: yes or no, even if group already exists, used in association between para & group

ref_link_paragraph.__comment_ref_para_2__: by adding a list of link_text strings in the paragraph record
